translation.Name: Name
translation.Failed to fetch updates. Try again later: Failed to fetch updates. Try again later!
translation.Application is already up to date!: Application is already up to date!
translation.Are you sure you want to delete \"{{name: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"?
translation.In order to use this feature you must al: In order to use this feature you must allow access to your camera!
In order to use this feature you must allow access to location services!
translation.cites.disclaimer: This is not legal advice! Because of taxonomic differences, CITES may not be fully compatible with the listed species and should therefore always be checked up separately. Some countries may have special regulations that are not included.
translation.cites.description.NC: Not or only partly covered by listing
translation.cites.description.I: Species threatened with extinction. Trade in specimens of these species is permitted only in exceptional circumstances.
translation.cites.description.II: Species not necessarily threatened with extinction, but in which trade must be controlled in order to avoid utilization incompatible with their survival.
translation.cites.description.III: Species that are protected in at least one country, which has asked other CITES Parties for assistance in controlling the trade.
translation.A unique identifier for the animal such: A unique identifier for the animal such as a DNA test filing-number or ring number.
translation.Hybrids are not listed and subspecies ma: Hybrids are not listed and subspecies may be listed under their parent-specie name.
translation.Select by pressing a location on the map: Select by pressing a location on the map or long-pressing the marker and dragging it around.
